definition: to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
grass/straw/manuscript/draft (of a document)/careless/rough/CL:棵[ke1],撮[zuo3],株[zhu1],根[gen1]
variant of 肏[cao4]
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Let us use it to end AIDS – once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們藉此勢頭，去消滅艾滋病，將它斬草除根。

sentences.english: We can never leave evil unchecked, we must remove the source of the trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我們決不可養癰遺患，一定要斬草除根。

sentences.english: They truly believed that to remain was to risk extermination.
sentences.chinese: 他們確實相信留下來需冒着斬草除根的風險。

sentences.english: Love is like a shovel to the pain.
sentences.chinese: 愛心猶如一把鏟能把痛苦斬草除根。

definition: fight to the death/desperate struggle
to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
conclusion/judgment/verdict
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
traitor
